name: The Block
title: Utf8b8jutw Trump Executive Order To Make Crypto
text:
Synopsis
Trump's potential executive order aims to elevate cryptocurrency to a national policy priority, signaling a potentially transformative shift in the U.S. government's approach to digital assets.

Key Insights
- Trump plans to issue an executive order making crypto a "national policy priority" after his inauguration
- Proposed executive order would create a crypto advisory council with industry executives
- Additional potential executive orders include:
  - Repealing SEC's crypto accounting guidance (SAB 121)
  - Establishing a potential bitcoin strategic reserve
- XRP derivatives show bullish sentiment, with market cap approaching $200 billion
- Bitcoin has reentered the $100,000 territory
- Ethereum developers aim to launch Pectra mainnet upgrade in March, featuring:
  - Raising validator stake limit from 32 to 2,048 ETH
  - Account abstraction
  - Updated deposit and exit mechanisms
- Phantom (Web3 wallet) raised $150 million at a $3 billion valuation
- Digital Currency Group agreed to pay a $38 million settlement to the SEC
